original_text: So the people did no more work on God's temple in Jerusalem. The work stopped until the second year that King Darius ruled Persia. So the people did no more work on God's temple in Jerusalem. The work stopped until the second year that King Darius ruled Persia.
korean_text: 이에 예루살렘에서 하나님의 성전 공사가 바사 왕 다리오 제이년까지 중단되니라

sentences.original_text: So the people did no more work
sentences.korean_translation: 그래서 사람들은 더 이상 일하지 않았다
